EmailTemplate.name: First time winners
EmailTemplate.subject: Connecting on your Five Star program questions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
Congratulations on being selected as a 2015 Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c}! You will be featured in the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Month__c} {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Issue_s__c} of {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Magazine__c}.
I want to answer any questions you have about how you were chosen for the award, and how the winners will be announced in the magazine.
If you have a few minutes to talk, please send me an email with a time that works best for you, or call me at your convenience.
I look forward to speaking with you soon.
{!User.Name}
Account Manager
Five Star Professional
2900 Lone Oak Parkway
Suite 120
Eagan, MN 55121
Direct: {!User.Phone}
Main: 1-888-438-5782
Fax: 651-259-1940
{!User.Email}
www.fivestarprofessional.com
